pages.text: Vertical redstone is like it's horizontal equivalent, but is not functionally the same. It is a pseudo-rs system.
Blocks that use the system update the block above them in order from the starting powered block all the way to the last block. A redstone signal is required for these kind of blocks to work.
The vertical redstone pole, and some other components, are all tagged as 'vertical_redstone_blocks', which allows them to use the system in the first place, which is hard-coded.
